results.title: Possible role of metformin as an antidepressant in diabetes.
results.text_hl: One of the comorbidities in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ is the @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@. This review aimed at summarizing the results of the available @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ and @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ studies to clarify the possible role of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ in the @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depression@@@ during @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

citations.NLM: Pedreañez A, Carrero Y, Vargas R, Hernandez-Fonseca JP, Mosquera-Sulbaran J. Possible role of metformin as an antidepressant in diabetes. J Affect Disord. 2024 Apr 15;351():349-355. PMID: 38286229
